name: Element:0
description:
Little experiment with genres. Match3 + rouglike + ship building.

Collect cells with elements on the map, fight off hordes of enemies.

Match 3 or more cells to upgrade it to a level 2, heal and create weapons.

ElementLevel 1Level 2Air SpeedMinimum damageEarth Armored but slowdownsMaximum damage with big cooldownFire Small damage to all nearby enemiesMedium damageWaterRegenerationFast damage

First round - 5 enemies. After each win +5 enemies with bigger level.

Control: WASD + Mouse. Esc to quit.
